title: Setup Project Infrastructure
description:
Initialize the Angular project with all necessary dependencies.

  • Install Angular CLI
  • Setup MobX
  • Configure routing

title: Implement Task List Component
description:
Create the main task list view with CRUD operations.

Requirements:

  • Display all tasks
  • Add new tasks
  • Edit existing tasks
  • Delete tasks

title: Implement Comment System
description: Build a multi-level comment thread system for task discussions.

title: Calendar Integration
description: Add FullCalendar to display tasks by deadline with color coding based on status.
